ATTR_UNIX.Com: sudo -iu cognos tbm bms import --bms-env &BM_ENV --aws-region us-east-1 --s3-bucket=warehouse-data.hbcbay/bmi/users bmi &ENV bluemartini-bmiimporter-&ENV --db-name store -w 20000 --ignore-import-failure

sudo -iu cognos DB2_SCHEMA=&DB2_SCHEMA DB2_USERNAME=&DB2_USERNAME DB2_PASSWORD=&DB2_PASSWORD DB2_ALIAS=&DB2_ALIAS ORACLE_DATABASE_CREDENTIALS=&ORACLE_DATABASE_CREDENTIALS /home/cognos/bayAccounts/to_bm/Step1/customer_account_migration.sh
sudo -iu cognos tbm cluster run-task us-east-1 &ENV accounts-etl-&ENV -w 5000
sudo -iu cognos tbm cluster run-task --task-arg us-east-1 --task-arg bridal_profile --task-arg warehouse-data.hbcbay/bridal/&ENV us-east-1 &ENV bridal-etl-&ENV -w 5000
sudo -iu cognos tbm cluster run-task --task-arg us-east-1 --task-arg wishlists --task-arg warehouse-data.hbcbay/wishlists/&ENV us-east-1 &ENV wishlists-etl-&ENV -w 5000

XHEADER.Title: WCS to Common Plat. Bridal Profiles for Old Prod
WCS to Common Plat. Email and Prefered language data
WCS to Common Plat. Email and Prefered language data
Fetching Email Marketing and Prefered language data from WCS in CSV files

ATTR_UNIX.Com: sudo -iu cognos DB2_USERNAME=&DB2_USERNAME DB2_PASSWORD=&DB2_PASSWORD DB2_SCHEMA=&DB2_SCHEMA DB2_ALIAS=&DB2_ALIAS /home/cognos/bayAccounts/email-marketing/exporting-email-marketing.sh

XHEADER.Title: Import the email marketing and prefered language to common plat.

ATTR_UNIX.Com: sudo -iu cognos tbm cluster run-task --task-arg us-east-1 --task-arg email-marketing --task-arg warehouse-data.hbcbay/email-marketing/&ENV us-east-1 &ENV email-marketing-etl-&ENV -w 5000

XHEADER.Title: WCS to BM Account migration for Old Prod (old vpc)

ATTR_UNIX.Com: sudo -iu cognos ENV=&ENV WCS_HOST=&WCS_HOST ORACLE_CREDENTIALS=&ORACLE_CREDENTIALS DB2_ALIAS=&DB2_ALIAS DB2_USERNAME=&DB2_USERNAME DB2_PASSWORD=&DB2_PASSWORD DB2_SCHEMA=&DB2_SCHEMA /home/cognos/bayAccounts/to-wcs/customer_account_migration_BMtoWCS.sh
